Introduction

HORI7ON is a global pop group under MLD Entertainment and jointly trained by ABS-CBN and KAMP Korea. The group was created through the survival show, Dream Maker, which aired in the Philippines.

After the show, they moved to South Korea to continue their training and promotions. They launched a show 100 Days Miracle and pre-released the singles "DASH", "Salamat", and "Lovey Dovey". On July 24, 2023, they made their official debut with the album "Friend-SHIP".
